DETAILS: The Awards Ceremony in honor of the students and teachers of our school (28.12.2016) was held on Wednesday at our College Grounds. Prof.K.Devaraja (Former Dean, Faculty of Management Studies, University of Jaffna) graced the occasion as the Chief Guest.

The award ceremony in honor of the students and teachers of our school (28.10.2017) was held on Wednesday at the Negombo Hindu Youth Forum under the chairmanship of Mr.N.puvaneswararaja. Prof.T.Velnambi graced the occasion as the Chief Guest.
